```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
three_circ_data <- three_circulars_with_noise(sample_size = 300, num_noise_dims = 2, min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(three_circ_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(three_circ_data))

langevitour(three_circ_data, pointSize = 2)
```
